setupScript.name: setFocusOnButtonAndSetStateToPressed
setupScript.description: sets focus on the button, and sets its state to 'pressed'

user: With focus on the 'Mute' button, activate the button.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Mute' button, activate the button.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Change in state, to 'not pressed', is conveyed
